title: Introducing: Audience

excerpt.full: Artwork by Isabella Lee Audience are a two piece, made up of Justin and Rémi, two friends that have only just begun to make music together. The result is an atmospheric and minimal sound; the various elements are barely held together, each sound cobbled together in a delightfully improvised way. At times it feels like \[…\]
